body.p: We the undersigned citizens of Henderson county respectfully request Your Honor to remit the fines imposed upon Mr James Frields at the June term 1859 of the Henderson Circuit Court. For Selling Spiritous Liquors without license. Mr Frields was ignorant of the Law, and was informed by Several of his neighbors that he could sell whiskey by the quart without obtaining lisence Mr Frields is a poor Man and the fines are very oppressive to him.
To his Honor the Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky
